        public NamingConvention()

    • Method Detail

      • isApplicable

        public abstract boolean isApplicable(T member)
        Returns:
        true if member can be processed by this convention. The first convention which returns true, wins.

      • getElementDescription

        public abstract java.lang.String getElementDescription()
        Returns:
        Text presentation which will be shown in check box UI

      • getShortName

        public abstract java.lang.String getShortName()
        Returns:
        unique short name; if tool was already present and merging of settings is required (AbstractNamingConventionMerger), short name should be equal to the old tool name

      • createDefaultBean

        public abstract NamingConventionBean createDefaultBean()
        Returns:
        default settings for the convention

      • isEnabledByDefault

        public boolean isEnabledByDefault()
        Returns:
        true, if newly created inspection should contain this convention on. false, if convention should be disabled for newly created inspection or if inspection is merged from inspections, disabled by default.

      • createErrorMessage

        public java.lang.String createErrorMessage(java.lang.String name,
                                           NamingConventionBean bean)

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(T member,
                       NamingConventionBean bean)
